Name: Ferro-fibrous armor
Details:
Ferro-fibrous armor is a protective armor incorporating a diamond weave that provides additional protection compared to standard armor.

Developed by the Terran Hegemony, it became widely available by 2571. Inner Sphere variants offers up to a 12% increase of protection however this armor type requares more space and critical slots inside a mech.

Technology to make ferro-fibrous armor was lost during the Succession Wars, but it was recreated by the Draconis Combine in 3040. The Free Worlds League and Lyran Alliance later developed lighter and heavier versions.
